title: My Room
transcript: This is my room. It is not big, but I like it. There is a bed near the window. The bed is blue. There is a desk next to the bed. I do my homework here. There is a chair at the desk. On the wall, there are pictures. I have a lamp on my desk. There is a wardrobe for my clothes. My room is clean and comfortable.

questions.question: There are pictures on the wall.
